title: New York Rep. Michael Grimm Indicted On 20 Counts
teaser: Rep. Michael Grimm of New York turned himself in to face federal charges related to a health food restaurant he ran before he was elected to Congress. The Republican congressman says he's innocent and plans to run for re-election this fall, but Democrats have have high hopes of flipping the last GOP-held seat in New York City.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
